# Exercise 1

## Simulation

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, results='hide'}
sim = list()
for (j in 1:1000) {
    vals = c()
    for (i in 1:100) {
        run = 3 + 3*cos(i/10 + 50) + rnorm(1, mean=0, sd=1)
        vals = c(vals, run)
    }
    sim[[j]] = vals
}
sim
```
